name: AVCapturePhotoCaptureDelegate
desc: Methods for monitoring progress and receiving results from a photo capture output.

items.name: func photoOutput(AVCapturePhotoOutput, willBeginCaptureFor: AVCaptureResolvedPhotoSettings)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that the capture output has resolved settings and will soon begin its capture process.

items.name: func photoOutput(AVCapturePhotoOutput, willCapturePhotoFor: AVCaptureResolvedPhotoSettings)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that photo capture is about to occur.

items.name: func photoOutput(AVCapturePhotoOutput, didCapturePhotoFor: AVCaptureResolvedPhotoSettings)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that the photo has been taken.

items.name: func photoOutput(AVCapturePhotoOutput, didFinishCaptureFor: AVCaptureResolvedPhotoSettings, error: Error?)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that the capture process is complete.

items.name: func photoOutput(AVCapturePhotoOutput, didFinishProcessingPhoto: AVCapturePhoto, error: Error?)
items.desc: Provides the delegate with the captured image and associated metadata resulting from a photo capture.

items.name: func photoOutput(AVCapturePhotoOutput, didFinishRecordingLivePhotoMovieForEventualFileAt: URL, resolvedSettings: AVCaptureResolvedPhotoSettings)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that the movie content of a Live Photo has finished recording.

items.name: func photoOutput(AVCapturePhotoOutput, didFinishProcessingLivePhotoToMovieFileAt: URL, duration: CMTime, photoDisplayTime: CMTime, resolvedSettings: AVCaptureResolvedPhotoSettings, error: Error?)
items.desc: Provides the delegate the movie file URL resulting from a Live Photo capture.
